captions.text:
You need to come down here...
- (singsong) Here...

(calypso music in background)
- So, hello to everyone.
- I'm here with the one and only--

So, last time we filmed
a video, what happened?
- Well, we won the Teen Choice Award.

- Thanks, you guys!
- Thanks very much everyone.
- We were like, "Okay, well, let's make

"another set of videos",
because, like, why not?

It's a machine that...
- You could

just sit on this, and put...
- ...just does that.
Have you ever seen the movie "Ghost"?

"Let me help you make
that pot, Demi Moore."
And he enters Whoopie Goldberg's body,
'cause she's a psychic, and she's, like,

doing the pot behind
Demi Moore, and they're

making it but he's like...
- Oh, like a physical pot.

Like a pot.
- Yeah, they're not, like,

smoking a doobie.
- And, like, Whoopie Goldberg
enters his body after he smokes the pot.

(Tyler laughing)
I'm like, what is this movie?
So, I'm gonna enter your body...

- First, you just; oh, shit--
- What is that?

- I can think of eight
things I could do with this.
- Connor, don't you dare come for me.

You see what I did?
- No.

- "Start with a fist-sized
ball of clay", it says.

- "Add some water and
roll it into a cylinder

- This is like one of
those little Russian dolls
where it's like a million things in one.
I've opened about three bags of plastic
- I have lain down a nice tarp

because Troye is a very
messy boy; woo-hoo-hoo!

How the fuck are we
gonna get it outta here?
- Oh, I got a messy, messy, mess!
Okay, you need to just focus and come out.

"You need to just focus
- Me to you, me to you

- and come out."
- when you were 15.
- I've made a mess, but I'm gonna fix it.

Okay, wait; see, look how
I can like mallea-mate it.
Hold on, hold on, hold on...
I know what I'm doing now.
- You're dip; you're not gonna dip it...
- Don't dip it, Ty; oh, I thought you were

- Have you ever just been
curious as to what's going on

in there, and you find this?
- No!

This is, by far, the grossest
thing I've ever seen you do.
I'm just excited to make it spin!
There y'go, there y'go, there y'go!

- Wait, what about this...
- Yep, pull it out...

- [Connor] It looks like
someone shit in a cup
and you guys are just playing with it.
- You gotta get, yeah, dip it.
- Wait, legit; this looks so good.

- We're doing it.
- Can I put my flowers in it?

- (singing) Aaahhhh,
squishy-squish, it's a good sign.
And then you kinda just, kinda...

Shit, it's getting floppy,
it's getting floppy!

I've lost it, wait!
(calypso music in background)

The more gooey it gets,
the more better it is.
I think your hand is too heavy.

(calypso music in background)
- Exactly how God intended.

- I genuinely like it; I think
we can put flowers in it,

I think we can do
whatever we want with it.

I think I found the trick.
- It looks the same

as before but worse.
- Why worse?

Make it real smooth.
(calypso music in background)

- Do we paint it now?
- Scaley boy...
So now, you have to let it dry.
- And then we can paint it later.

- That's very cute.
- This is cute.

Lick it?
- You can lick it.
So, we're gonna let these dry.
- We'll be back in a second.

It is morning, very early, but
we're back, because today...
we're gonna, oh, look what has happened.

You know what, these
pots aren't done, Troye.
- Because we gotta make them look cute.

Alright, so I'm going for
some soul stuff at first...
- I'm liking a sponge effect on my pot

because I love a sponged pot.
- Pot...

- Now, I love just coordinating
just the right colors,
and in this case, it's every color.

Tyler!
- Oh, that was so close!

- I think they look so
cute and I can't wait
for one of you guys to get this.
How are they gonna get it?

- And comment, saying...
- And comment why you want it.

And we also did another video
over on Troye's channel.
with apple juice for me 'cause I'm 19,

- Right.
- but it was really really fun

- you can click on either of
us now to go to that video.
- And the link that's below us,
so go check it out and give it some love.

And subscribe to Troye,
because he's the best.
- We've been like skirting around it like,
hey, do I notice, then you straight up
- Dang this gushy butthole booce, er...
